name: Factory Inc.
description:
You became the boss of a factory that can make anything.
Upgrade your machines, and make various products.
Hire the manager, and automate the factory.
Earn money easily.
Expand your business, and make more money.

Features of the Factory Inc.:
• Be a boss and manage your factory.
• More than 20 kinds of machines that have abilities from ordinary to legend.
• Various managers with their own abilities.
• More than 90 products, including furniture, smartphones and cars.
• Earn Money even when offline.
• Sell a Company system to maximize profit.
• Offline gameplay is available !
• A masterpiece of simulation game that can automatically earn money.
• More rapid production by Tap.
• Challenge Mode "Tap The Gold, Get The Money!"
